name: Num-Sama
description:
Num-Sama is a fast-paced action game that takes place in feudal Japan. As a lone samurai, you take on your foes in third-person melee combat. Num-Sama features a novel approach to combat interactions, in which your blade is manipulated not through mouse movements or clicks, but by your Numpad keystrokes.
Master your Blade
Perfect your sword skills and become one with your weapon. Translate your keystrokes to slashes and thrusts with the power of your Numpad. No need for a mouse.

Defend your Dojo
Only you can save your dojo. Find and protect your peers from the raiders of the enemy clan. Deflect incoming attacks from all sides or guide clashed blades to overpower your enemy. The key is to observe your opponent’s attack angles and respond with the right combination in time.

Survive the Raid
Your meditation was interrupted by an intruder. No one heard them coming. Fight your way out of a dawn raid, where ninjas patiently wait around every corner. Be on your toes as you clear your dojo, room by room. They can come from every direction.

Key Features
• Two levels, full of enemies to fight and defeat using different attack combinations.
• Enemies that engage suddenly and without hesitation, sometimes multiple enemies at once!
• A unique boss that forces you to rethink your strategy and adapt to new challenges.
• Quick time events that lead to you overpowering your enemies into submission and ends in rare finishers.
• Your Numpad keystrokes determine the path of your blade and the direction of your attacks, letting you become one with your weapon in a new and exciting way.
